metadataAttributes.Title: Transforming the Fashion Business Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Design the Future of the Fashion Business. Master the challenges facing the fashion industry in today's complex and evolving landscape
metadataAttributes.Skills: Fashion Design, Fashion Systems, Sustainability, Holistic Product Lifecyle, Retail Management, Systems Thinking, Product Life Cycles, User-Centered Design, Research And Development (R&D), Trend Analysis, ethical design and production, Collaboration,
